Title: Artisan's Supply: Quality-Assured Optics
Description:
Ah, an engineer! Excellent timing.

I've got some schematics to fix, but some tall lady came by asking for a set of optics.

You know how to make those, right?

Take 'em to the Ruby Lifeshrine when you have 'em crafted. I think she said she was with the Artisan's Consortium or something.
ObjectivesText: Deliver a pair of Quality-Assured Optics to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver a pair of Quality-Assured Optics to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
